citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
No responsible person was available to conduct an inspection at 3 PM on 5/1/2015.
A responsible adult shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
To be corrected on all subsequent inspections.
